name: beirut
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the capital city of Lebanon, in the western part of the country: Ibrahim and I met in a nightclub a few months after I moved to Beirut. A group of preservationists wants to restore the building in central Beirut as a museum.
More examplesFewer examplesWe arrived in Beirut the following morning.He lives in a small town 20 miles from Beirut.We are in Lebanon, a beautiful corner of the Eastern Mediterranean where the beaches of Beirut quickly give way to cedar-covered mountains.
